ISSUE.TITLE: Split the InstallationService into several parts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: - 4.70.8 Steps to reproduce the problem: - The InstallationService is massive, making local changes and synching is a pain (e.g. #7121). Since the InstallationService is already a partial class, splitting it in three makes it easier to work with. An alternative (better?) way of doing this would be to inject two other services. I've done this in my project [here](https://github.com/danzuep/nopCommerce/tree/develop), but after I re-based I realised I'd missed some changes from @exileDev 21 hours ago, so maybe one of the core team should implement this.
